attributes.action: Reduce the level of tax on alchohol to help prevent the closures of the local pub that aid social structure within inner city housing estates.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This Petition is intended to make aware the importance of the local public house within the social stucture of our inner towns and cities.
This vital link is now under its greatest ever threat of failure. The largest contributary factor being the very high level of duty imposed upon alchohol, which was recently added to by Mr Darling. At a time when everyday prices are soaring we feel that the recent rise was imposed without proper afore thought and incorrect reasons namely binge drinking.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
